name: Brawlers
description:
Hey all,

  • The game works over WAN but to play you are required to port forward the server.
  • Else on LAN it is as simple as going into command prompt and typing ipconfig to find your IPV4 address. Give that to your friends, and they can connect.
  • The game is currently a demo so feel free to play. 
  • Please note that the final product will look nothing like this demo
  • Crash reports are automatically sent to Sentry so if you don't want that don't play.
  • Please report any issues you experience in the discussion board down below.

Thanks,

xyrexy
